entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
